name: Home Run!
description:
Note:  Please wait for game to open up completely after progress bar completes. Project developed in GlobalGameJam 2019 under 48 hours. Due to limited time in game jam, we couldn't implemented an ending scene so if you find and bring back them all you won't see a game completed sign. Any comments/critiques/feedbacks are welcome, hope you enjoy!

Storyline:
A flock of birds has been disbanded by a storm and fall apart from each other into distant islands. You are the chosen one to bring back the all flock together, and MAKE THE HOME GREAT AGAIN!

Goal:
- Fly away and find all birds in the distant islands by exploring whole world, and bring back them to nest in the homeland. Note: due to limited time in game jam, we couldn't implemented an ending scene so if you find and bring back them all you won't see a game completed sign :(

Controls:
- Mouse click/hold to move any area

Credits:
- Burak Kürkçü (@_burakkurkcu) - Game Design & Art
- Ertan Ünver (@ertanunver) - Programming
- Gözde Berberoğlu (@gozdeberberoglu) - Music & Sound FX
